text:
Hello, guys. I have a simple question.

If I make a multi-language variation of a page, and the primary language is for example.. German, but I add English as another option, will HubSpot automatically load the English page for users with English as their preferred language, or will they need to use the drop down menu to translate the page?

You need to use language switcher to allow user to choose their prefer language.
you can find more details about <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/how-to-manage-multi-language-content-with-HubSpots-cos|managing multi language content here>
